text:
Upcoming Sunset: HubDB v1 API, HubDB v2 API, and HubDB JavaScript Client Upcoming Sunset: HubDB v1 API, HubDB v2 API, and HubDB JavaScript Client *On Jan 31, 2024*, we will be sunsetting the following items in relation to HubDB: • HubDB v1
• <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/hubdb/hubdb_overview|HubDB v2>
• <https://docs.google.com/document/u/1/d/e/2PACX-1vTuu12oFF4bQY1zVD2-WKFuM2dEDN81-fZRV1tGaCL5Z_OcjC-B6O3mHXR6chaq25BU1D2FuvKIjc49/pub|HubDB JavaScript Client> We encourage users to migrate the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/hubdb|HubDB v3 API>. This API includes many performance, usability, and API consistency improvements over the v1 and v2 API. Read more on our changelog and discuss on our community. :rolled_up_newspaper: View on Changelog button :mega: Discuss on Community Forum button
